_description: A catch for drinking, for three voices — six lines

BodArcSelB26.Transcription:
Tappster fyll another alehave I doo god send vs good saleA vale
                    þe stake a valehere ys good ale I fovndedrynke to me & I to
                    þeand lette þe coppe goo Rounde
